listings.title: Listings
listings.description: Drag to reorder. Custom names appear everywhere in the dashboard.

forecast_refresh.title: ML Forecast Refresh
forecast_refresh.description: Auto mode refreshes ML forecasts in the background while the UI is idle. Manual mode never auto-runs, including on load.

quick_filters.title: Quick Filters
quick_filters.description: Show all listing buttons in quick filters even when the list is large.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.description: Drag to reorder. Custom names appear in filters and tables.
